name: Fallen Hero
description:
Fallen Hero is a LowPoly RPG game in the first person view.

It tells a tale of a group of legendary Heros that once protected the empire from great evil but suddenly disappeared.

For now this is just a small tech demo that we have been working on for fun in our free time...

We hope you like it! ^^

PS: This is also our first real "game" so don't expect too much.
